subject: New IME Referral – Johnathan Doe – Case #NF-39281
body:
Good morning,

We are referring a new Independent Medical Examination for the following case:

Patient Name: Johnathan Doe
Date of Birth: 05/12/1978
Case Number: NF-39281
Exam Type: Orthopedic IME
Exam Date: March 15, 2025
Exam Time: 2:00 PM
Location: Los Angeles, CA

Referring Party: Smith & Associates Law Firm
Contact Email: referrals@lawfirmabc.com
Report Due Date: March 30, 2025

Attached please find:
- Medical records
- Declaration of Melissa Grant

Please confirm receipt and availability for this examination.

Thank you,
Sarah Johnson
Case Manager
Smith & Associates Law Firm

attachments.text_content: Declaration of Melissa Grant regarding Johnathan Doe. I declare under penalty of perjury that I witnessed the incident on January 15, 2024, where Mr. Doe sustained injuries to his lower back and right shoulder while working at the construction site...

Medical records for Johnathan Doe. Patient presented with acute lower back pain radiating to right leg. History of injury sustained at work on 01/15/2024. Initial treatment included physical therapy and pain management. MRI shows L4-L5 disc herniation with nerve compression...
